```{r}
# Exemple de solution commentée
source("../../utils/requirements.R")
library(AmesHousing); library(broom); library(performance); library(car); library(dplyr)
set.seed(123)
ames <- make_ames() %>% janitor::clean_names()
mod <- lm(sale_price ~ gr_liv_area + overall_qual + year_built + full_bath + garage_cars, data = ames)
summary(mod)
performance::check_collinearity(mod)
car::ncvTest(mod)
```
